Title: 3. News Media

Yo peeps, here's the latest scoop: according to some economists, the Reserve Bank of Australia may raise interest rates soon due to positive jobs data. However, some are calling out for the RBA to pause its rate hikes to relieve economic pressure on businesses. Meanwhile, mortgage holders can breathe a sigh of relief as the RBA announces its record rate hike run has come to an end. The ASX 200 is also boosted by the bank's rate hold decision in May.
